name: gates of the road
description:
Gates of the road 2016
It is a game that will make you drive a car in the woods and off-road containing barriers
such as fencing and rocks and pieces of concrete
and you have to crashing or Avoid it to complet the way in shortest time possible
With the ability to stop time at any time during play and take a look at the scattered pieces
And the ability to make the camera rotates around the car
